text: Dick Dastardly is a fictional character and antagonist who appeared in many animated series by Hanna-Barbera Productions from 1968 onward. ==Overview== Dastardly's most famous appearances are as a main character in the series Wacky Races and its spin-off, Dastardly and Muttley in Their Flying Machines where he appeared as a good guy. He and Muttley appeared as the main villains in the Warner Bros.' 2020 Scooby-Doo CGI animated film Scoob!. He is partly based on the English actor Terry-Thomas. ==Portrayals== Dick Dastardly was voiced by Paul Winchell before being replaced by Jim Cummings, Peter Woodward, Rob Paulsen, Jason Isaacs, Tom Kenny, and Eric Bauza. ==References== Category:Fictional criminals Category:Scooby-Doo characters Category:Animated movie villains Category:Hanna-Barbera characters Category:Fictional British people Category:Animated human characters Category:Animated television characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1960s
title: Dick Dastardly
